Reviews.Title: Bad Purchase
Reviews.Author: J. Meyers "Tunnelmann"
Reviews.Content: This Phone was not new as described. The ring tone was not the original tone that comes with a new phone. After 2 months usage the phone no longer works. DO NOT buy this phone from this supplier.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: NANZG1
Reviews.Content: Got this for my mom because i use to own one when flip phones where popular and i loved it! and since my mom doesnt do the new technical stuff i knew this would work for her. Great choice!

Reviews.Title: GREAT BASIC PHONE FOR CALLING AND TEXTING!
Reviews.Author: ~ g ~ "~ g ~"
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for over 5 years. It's been a great phone! This phone has been used for basic callingand text messaging. It has "Media Net" capabilities, though I've never used that feature.It is incredibly durable.  It's been dropped more times than I care to think about.  It's still using the originalbattery!  This battery still holds a charge for an entire day.  After 5 years of use, I'm not complaining that Ineed to charge it every night.The small window on the front is easy to read even without my glasses when a call is coming in or if there is amessage or a missed call.The volume key is located in a natural place on the upper part of the phone....no need to look at or take the phonefrom your ear to raise or lower the volume during a call.The back cover is made of a non slip type of material- nice because it doesn't tend to slip as many others.It has a very basic camera that shoots at less than 1mp. It can take 10sec video clips as well.I've traveled all over the country and never had a problem with reception or dropped calls.I'll be sad when this one has to be replaced.  If I find another at a good price I'm gonna grab it!One additional note: The V557 that I have has been used on the AT&T; network. It is not unlocked.

Reviews.Title: good purchase
Reviews.Author: ms camacho
Reviews.Content: The phone i purchased for my son was in excellent condition.  My son was very surprised that I purchased this phone he had this phone, but in a different design. The battery to his old phone wasn't working.  so I decided to go back to cingular  that's where it was first purchased to buy the battery they told me that they didn't carry it any longer. Then they told me to call the company of motorala to see if they carry it they said that they no longer carry that battery for that phone. that's when i decided to go on line to see if i could find the battery but i notice the same phone on amazon. that's when i decided to purchased the phone and surprise him. he's enjoying his phone he didn't want another phone. i guess i made a good choice.if i need a unlock phone i would go back to amazon.com

Reviews.Title: GREAT OLD PHONE
Reviews.Author: TEABAG
Reviews.Content: THE MOTOROLA V557 IS A GOOD PHONE AND I HAVE NO INTENTION OF STARTING ALL OVER WITH (2) HANDSFREE DEVICES IN MY CARS. IT WOULD COST ME OVER $300 TO UPGRADE AND REPLACE EVERYTHING.THIS PURCHASE SAVED ME $235 AND IT WORKS GOOD.

Reviews.Title: ??? A V557
Reviews.Author: P. Bartley
Reviews.Content: Received Phone in new condition and quickly, however the serial number was wrong from what the phone stated and when I hooked it up to phone tools it said the phone was a V551j which was almost identical to the V557 except for the color and software. It also seems to be using excessive battery power it dosen't give you much of a warning, I'm thankful that I had the older battery for a backup.

Reviews.Title: great flip phone
Reviews.Author: Gale L.
Reviews.Content: I live in an area that does not have reliable signal output with almost all carriers. My previous old Motorola phones (V400 & V551) were durable but adequate. I purchased a LG Prime Smart phone for internet capability, but that didn't work at all. My most important consideration was a phone that works and this does the job.  The charger that was included did not charge the phone, but luckily, the chargers that I had with my previous phones worked for this one. The other negative is not having a manual for reference of this phone's additional features.

Reviews.Title: Motorola V557 flip phone
Reviews.Author: Charles Hardin Holley
Reviews.Content: This is the best phone I've ever had. I've went through 3 V557's in the last 10 years or so. My last one finally got worn out, so I thought I'd go to a smart phone everyone says is so great. My family purchased 3 new Samsung Galaxy 111's, and I hate mine. I'm going to go down to AT&T; and see if I can transfer my account to a V557, and get ride of the Samsung. If I can, I'm going to buy the V557. The battery would last almost a week and it's durable and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Rating on Motorola cell phone
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: It does not ring sometimes and leaves a message  I will be waiting for a call and it has come on voice mail.It akes hours to charge.  very slow on charging.  My AT&T; panasonic was a much better phone. I would buy AT&T; againSeller was very good to work with.

Reviews.Title: tough Phone,,  easy to use
Reviews.Author: peter pavlicek
Reviews.Content: The Li-ion battery is substandard,,, It doesn't keep a charge for more than day and takes a long period to charge,,  I contacted on line, Motorola and tried to register my phone only to find out it was ''Out Of Warranty''  twenty days after purchase.  I ordered a new OEM Battery, and am waiting to see it it is better,, I Am disappointed that Motorola does not honor a New Old stock Phone's warranty,,,  The internal antenna, and sound Quality are top Notch,,,

Reviews.Title: Great deal on a replacement Motorola V557 phone.
Reviews.Author: Dminiguy37
Reviews.Content: I needed to replace my flip phone I damaged after running over it with my car after it fell out of my pocket.  The phone mechanically was ok but the case was damaged.  I looked online at all of the new flip phones and read the reviews.  I was shocked to find nothing but bad reviews.  I knew the old phone I had had been a good one.  I luckily found one like I had damaged on Amazon.  I purchased it and took it to the local AT&T; store for transferring my phone numbers and pictures to it from my old phone.  I had limited success there so I phoned AT&T;'s tech support.  They walked me right through the procedures.  I am very much pleased with my purchase and AT&T;'s tech support.
